snippet: Yorkville Endoscopy in Manhattan, which was prohibited from receiving federal funds after the comedian’s death, has until March 2 to comply with requested changes.
abstract: Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services grants Yorkville Endoscopy, Manhattan clinic where comedian Joan Rivers died during medical procedure, second chance to correct problems and keep its accreditation.
lead_paragraph: Yorkville Endoscopy in Manhattan, which was prohibited from receiving federal funds after the comedian’s death, has until March 2 to comply with requested changes.

headline.main: Surgery Clinic in Joan Rivers’s Death Gets a Reprieve
headline.print_headline: Surgery Clinic in Comic’s Death Gets a Reprieve

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services
